name: Believe
details:
Octavia style Octave upThis oldschool-style octavia circuit gives you the octave up sound without the fuzz that's usually associated with octave-up pedals. Your octave-up signal is also treated to some of that famous ring-modulation that octavias are known for. If you're looking for something to help your tone kiss the sky, this is your ticket UP!
www.lovepedal.com
